org.uclab.mm.icl.hlc.HLCNotifier

Class HLCNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uclab.mm.icl.hlc.HLCNotifier.HLCNotifier

  • public class HLCNotifier
extends java.lang.Object
    HLC Notifier: Component of HLCA which communicates the newly recognized High Level Context instance to Data Curation Layer and persists it into the Context Ontology Storage.
    Since:
    2015-10-28
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Claudia Villalonga

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HLCNotifier(ContextOntology ont)
      Constructor of a new HLC Notifier.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notify(NutritionContext newHlc)
      Method that receives the newly classified High Level Context instance, stores it into the Context Ontology Storage, and if the new instance belongs to a different High Level Context type than the previous one, notifies Data Curation Layer about the detection of a new High Level Context.
      void notify(PhysicalActivityContext newHlc)
      Method that receives the newly classified High Level Context instance, stores it into the Context Ontology Storage, and if the new instance belongs to a different High Level Context type than the previous one, notifies Data Curation Layer about the detection of a new High Level Context.
      void notifyTest(NutritionContext newHlc) 
      void notifyTest(PhysicalActivityContext newHlc)
      Test method that applies the same business logic than notify but prints messages through the standard output stream.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • HLCNotifier

        public HLCNotifier(ContextOntology ont)
        Constructor of a new HLC Notifier.
        Parameters:
        ont - Context Ontology which represents the Mining Minds Context Model.

    • Method Detail

      • notify

        public void notify(PhysicalActivityContext newHlc)
        Method that receives the newly classified High Level Context instance, stores it into the Context Ontology Storage, and if the new instance belongs to a different High Level Context type than the previous one, notifies Data Curation Layer about the detection of a new High Level Context.
        Parameters:
        newHlc - Newly classified High Level Context instance.

      • notify

        public void notify(NutritionContext newHlc)
        Method that receives the newly classified High Level Context instance, stores it into the Context Ontology Storage, and if the new instance belongs to a different High Level Context type than the previous one, notifies Data Curation Layer about the detection of a new High Level Context.
        Parameters:
        newHlc - Newly classified High Level Context instance.
